error_description: Missing addressRepository.save(addressEntity) call before returning response, causing data loss as new address is never persisted to database
Missing userRepository.delete(existingUserEntity) call, causing delete operation to fail silently with data loss
Native SQL query uses direct string concatenation of user input 'username', creating SQL injection vulnerability
Password update expression double-encodes new password with passwordEncoder.encode(passwordEncoder.encode(dto.password())), corrupting the hash
listAll loads all users into memory with findAll() instead of findAll(pageable), causing performance bottleneck and incorrect pagination
Missing @PreAuthorize annotation on delete method, allowing any authenticated user to delete any user account
@PostMapping consumes='text/plain' incompatible with @RequestBody AddressRequest expecting JSON, causing deserialization failure
Missing @Validated(Update.class) on update method's AddressRequest parameter, skipping validation on PATCH requests
checkLogin uses .get() on Optional<User>, throwing NoSuchElementException if user not found and enabling username enumeration
getById uses findById().get() instead of orElseThrow, risking unhandled NoSuchElementException instead of proper 404
